price: Na Firauni akasema: Nileteeni kila mchawi mjuzi!
arabic: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱئۡتُونِي بِكُلِّ سَٰحِرٍ عَلِيمٖ
footnotes: Firauni na kaumu yake wakadai kuwa Musa na nduguye ni wachawi, wala si Mitume! Akawataka watu wake wamhudhurishe kila aliye hodari katika fani za uchawi katika mamlaka yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqāla fir'ʿawnu i'tūnī bikulli sāḥirin ʿalīmin
